status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

fields.description: ARROW-8049 increased the minimum cmake version required for bundled thrift to 3.10, which is not what 16.04 ships. We removed packaging jobs in ARROW-11910 because it is EOL in April 2021, but we still have a nightly job that is failing and other related materials (Dockerfile etc.) for 16.04.

comments.body: FYI [~kou], noticed this while looking at nightly jobs on ARROW-12094
